summary: A recoloring to give Solitude a more earthy, warmer and more forest-type feel.
descriptionHtml:
After seeing how wonderful Whiterun looked after my first recoloring mod, I decided to go further, and did the same thing to Solitude.  I basically modified contrast, hues and saturation, and did a few other things to make it look nice and foresty.  

Now...the trees that you see in this mod are not a part of it...just the textures.  If you want the trees and forest elements, you can download them from the \"City Forests\" mod by Desecrates:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9558
Anyway, I hope that you guys like my warmers earth-toned Solitude as much as the Whiterun.  Make sure to download both for maximum results...as I believe that some of the textures from each are used for each other....or something like that.  :)
author: Stephanie Young
